name: Send a personalized voice message for each new Google Sheets row
description:
Automate your outreach with this template that sends a personalized voice message every time a new row is added to your Google Sheets spreadsheet. Perfect for sales, onboarding, reminders, or follow-ups, this workflow uses AI to personalize each message using the contact’s name and phone number directly from the spreadsheet.

This template connects Google Sheets and VoiceDrop to streamline communication and save time. The contact’s name is pulled from column A (name) and the phone number from column B (phone). Make sure these columns are properly labeled and filled in for the workflow to run smoothly.

How it works:

A new row is inserted in Google Sheets

The contact’s name and phone are extracted from the row

A personalized AI-generated voice message is sent to the phone number

This template was created by [VoiceDrop].
